title.rendered: SORA GARDENS II PROJECT ACHIEVES 500,000 SAFE-MAN HOURS WITHOUT LTI.

content.rendered:
[Binh Duong, May 29th, 2020] The Sora Gardens II Project has officially achieved 500,000 safe man-hours. The program was attended by the representative of the Developer – BTMJR Investment Co., Ltd, the representative of supervision consultant – Artelia Vietnam Co., Ltd. and the entire Newtecons Site Management Team at the project.

During the construction process, the Site Management Team together with the Safety Committee give drastic instructions in the management and control of labor safety activities at the project. Achieving the milestone of 500,000 safe working hours is a recognition of the contribution of team who have strictly observed safety rules during 13 months of construction.

At the prgram, Mr. Hirata Shuji – General Director of BTMJR Investment Company highly appreciated Newtecons with the efforts during the past time. With the achievement of 500,000 safe man-hours, he believes that Newtecons will continue to reach 1.5 million safe man-hours, bring the project to safety on schedule and quality.
